Package de.ikor.sip.foundation.core.declarative.connector

Class ConnectorBase

java.lang.Object
de.ikor.sip.foundation.core.declarative.connector.ConnectorBase
All Implemented Interfaces:
ConnectorDefinition, DeclarativeElement, Orchestratable<ConnectorOrchestrationInfo>, org.springframework.beans.factory.Aware, org.springframework.context.ApplicationContextAware
Direct Known Subclasses:
GenericOutboundConnectorBase, InboundConnectorBase
public abstract non-sealed class ConnectorBase extends Object implements ConnectorDefinition, org.springframework.context.ApplicationContextAware
Base class for connector definitions.

This class provides a default implementation for the Orchestrator interface, and allows subclasses to attach an Orchestrator for the transformation between connector and common domain models through the defineTransformationOrchestrator() method.

    • defineTransformationOrchestrator

      protected Orchestrator<ConnectorOrchestrationInfo> defineTransformationOrchestrator()
      Defines the Orchestrator for the transformation between connector and common domain models. It is typically meant to be overridden, as the base implementation returns a simple ConnectorOrchestrator which does not contain any additional model transformation logic. It is only suitable if the connectors and the common domain model share the same type.
      Returns:
      Orchestrator for the transformation between connector and common domain models.
